mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id AS memberId ,m.point_level AS memberPointLevel ,m.total_point_code AS memberTotalPointCode ,m.total_point_used AS memberTotalPointUsed ,m.usable_point AS memberUsablePoint ,m.member_pw AS memberPw ,m.member_status AS memberStatus ,m.member_level AS memberLevel ,m.member_name AS memberName ,m.contact AS memberContact ,m.birthday AS memberBirthday ,m.email AS memberEmail ,m.reg_time AS memberRegTime ,m.country AS memberCountry ,m.about AS memberAbout ,m.avatar_image AS memberAvatarImage ,m.banner_image AS memberBannerImage FROM tb_member AS m;
